title: Speak "Friend" and Enter (2C26)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship or Regroup: Spot Gandalf to play the fellowship's next site (replacing opponent's site if necessary). Draw a card if you play an underground site.
Lore:	“Picking up his staff he stood before the rock and said in a clear voice: Mellon!”
Rarity:	C
